There were no other sightings in Novato on or around January 20th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsSeem to be connected kinda like a helicopter, no noise though, but 3 ORANGE LIGHTS. It woke me up because there was orange light in my backyard and I was sleeping on the couch in living room. Hovered over my backyard for a minute then disappeared.
